00026 Cpu::Cpu() : name_(QString()), addressSpaceRefs_(), parameters_()
00027 {
00028 }
00029 
00030 Cpu::Cpu(QDomNode &cpuNode): name_(QString()), addressSpaceRefs_(),
00031 parameters_() {
00032 
00033         for (int i = 0; i < cpuNode.childNodes().count(); ++i) {
00034                 QDomNode tempNode = cpuNode.childNodes().at(i);
00035 
00036                 // dont try to parse comments
00037                 if (tempNode.isComment()) {
00038                         continue;
00039                 }
00040 
00041                 if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:name")) {
00042 
00043                         // strip whitespace characters
00044                         name_ = tempNode.childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00045                         name_ = General::removeWhiteSpace(name_);
00046                 }
00047                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:addressSpaceRef")) {
00048 
00049                         // get the spirit:addressSpaceRef attribute
00050                         QDomNamedNodeMap attributeMap = tempNode.attributes();
00051                         QString str = attributeMap.namedItem(QString(
00052                                         "spirit:addressSpaceRef")).childNodes().at(0).nodeValue();
00053 
00054                         // if the mandatory element is missing
00055                         if (str.isNull()) {
00056                                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory attribute spirit:"
00057                                                 "addressSpaceRef missing in spirit:addressSpaceRef"));
00058                         }
00059 
00060                         // all was fine and attribute can be added
00061                         addressSpaceRefs_.append(str);
00062                 }
00063                 else if (tempNode.nodeName() == QString("spirit:parameters")) {
00064 
00065                         // go through all parameters
00066                         for (int j = 0; j < tempNode.childNodes().count(); ++j) {
00067 
00068                                 QDomNode parameterNode = tempNode.childNodes().at(j);
00069 
00070                                 // dont parse comments
00071                                 if (!parameterNode.isComment()) {
00072                                         parameters_.append(QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00073                                                         new Parameter(parameterNode)));
00074                                 }
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077         }
00078 
00079         // if mandatory elements are missing
00080 
00081         if (name_.isNull()) {
00082                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory element name missing in "
00083                                 "spirit:cpu"));
00084         }
00085 
00086         if (addressSpaceRefs_.size() == 0) {
00087                 throw Parse_error(QObject::tr(
00088                                 "Mandatory element spirit:addressSpaceRef missing in "
00089                                 "spirit:cpu"));
00090         }
00091 }
00092 
00093 Cpu::Cpu( const Cpu &other ):
00094 name_(other.name_),
00095 addressSpaceRefs_(other.addressSpaceRefs_),
00096 parameters_() {
00097 
00098         foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00099                 if (param) {
00100                         QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00101                                 new Parameter(*param.data()));
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 }
00105 
00106 Cpu & Cpu::operator=( const Cpu &other ) {
00107         if (this != &other) {
00108                 name_ = other.name_;
00109                 addressSpaceRefs_ = other.addressSpaceRefs_;
00110 
00111                 parameters_.clear();
00112                 foreach (QSharedPointer<Parameter> param, other.parameters_) {
00113                         if (param) {
00114                                 QSharedPointer<Parameter> copy = QSharedPointer<Parameter>(
00115                                         new Parameter(*param.data()));
00116                         }
00117                 }
00118         }
00119         return *this;
00120 }
00121 
00122 Cpu::~Cpu() {
00123         parameters_.clear();
00124 }
00125 
00126 void Cpu::write(QXmlStreamWriter& writer) {
00127         writer.writeStartElement("spirit:cpu");
00128 
00129         // if mandatory name doesn't exist
00130         if (name_.isEmpty()) {
00131                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory name missing in "
00132                                 "spirit:cpu"));
00133         }
00134         else {
00135                 writer.writeTextElement("spirit:name", name_);
00136         }
00137 
00138         // atleast one addressSpaceRef must be found
00139         if (addressSpaceRefs_.size() == 0) {
00140                 throw Write_error(QObject::tr("Mandatory addressSpaceRef missing in "
00141                                 "spirit:cpu"));
00142         }
00143         else {
00144                 for (int i = 0; i < addressSpaceRefs_.size(); ++i) {
00145 
00146                         // the IP-Xact specification defines this to be empty element with
00147                         // mandatory attribute of same name. Maybe this will change in
00148                         // future.
00149                         writer.writeEmptyElement("spirit:addressSpaceRef");
00150                         writer.writeAttribute("spirit:addressSpaceRef",
00151                                         addressSpaceRefs_.at(i));
00152                 }
00153         }
00154 
00155         // write parameters if they exist
00156         if (parameters_.size() != 0) {
00157                 writer.writeStartElement("spirit:parameters");
00158 
00159                 for (int i = 0; i < parameters_.size(); ++i) {
00160                         parameters_.at(i)->write(writer);
00161                 }
00162                 writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:parameters
00163         }
00164 
00165         writer.writeEndElement(); // spirit:cpu
00166         return;
00167 }
00168 
00169 const QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> >& Cpu::getParameters() {
00170         return parameters_;
00171 }

00173 void Cpu::setParameters(QList<QSharedPointer<Parameter> > &parameters) {
00174         // delete the old parameters
00175         parameters_.clear();
00176 
00177         // save the new parameteres
00178         parameters_ = parameters;
00179 }

00193 void Cpu::setAddressSpaceRefs(QList<QString> &addressSpaceRefs) {
00194         // remove old addressSpaceRefs
00195         addressSpaceRefs_.clear();
00196         addressSpaceRefs_ = addressSpaceRefs;
